title: 2,000 MT of Gas reaches Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said that another vessel carrying 2,000 MT of gas arrived in the country on Monday (6).
Litro Chairman Eng. Vijitha Herath said that the unloading of gas will be carried out on Tuesday (7).
The Chairman further said that the gas distribution will be carried out from Wednesday (8).
In the meantime, Litro gas said that a limited domestic LP Gas (12.5 kg, 5kg & 2.3kg) distribution will be in effect for Colombo and Gampaha areas on Tuesday (7).
